1153 The Shutdown Was Always Going To End With Democrats Caving And Looking Ridiculous (thefederalist.com) posted 1 day ago by Sea_Still 52 comments award share report block Shutdown Was Always Going To End With Ridiculous Dems Caving Even after some modest electoral victories just last week, the Democrat Party is still a ridiculous, anti-American organization. thefederalist.com
